original_text:
But which of them has stood in the council of the Lord
    to see or to hear his word?
    Who has listened and heard his word?
korean_text: 누가 여호와의 회의에 참여하여 그 말을 알아들었으며 누가 귀를 기울여 그 말을 들었느냐

sentences.original_text: But which of them has stood
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들 중 누가 서 있었는가

sentences.original_text: in the council of the Lord
to see or to hear his word?
Who has listened and heard his word?
